content: Christoph TREUDE | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Christoph TREUDE Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Computer Science Research Statement Qualification PhD, University of Victoria, 2012 Teaching Topics Digital Business Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to GUAN Xueting LOK Kek Wee +6568085438 ctreude@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceData Management & MiningDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceHuman-Machine Collaborative SystemsHuman-Computer InteractionInformation Systems & TechnologySoftware Engineering Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
